attributes.action: Make riding bitless for any competitions legal
attributes.additional_details:
I have a mare that I’ve rescued and turned out to be a lot older then I was told !
We have been through hell and back with the riding side of things
To the point I was thinking of giving up! This is my life and she is my best friend I have recently changed her to bitless and riding her in a hackamore and the difference is unreal I can’t even explain how comfortable she is when being ridden and stress free! 
Please let’s get this legal and make it a much kinder way of riding
attributes.background:
Making riding bitless for any competitions become legal as surly this is a lot more kinder to the horses/ponies mouth when riding.
There is lots of horses out there that can’t physically have a bit in their mouth as it puts them in so much pain ! 
Please let’s get this legal for the horses sake

rejection.details: This is a decision for the organisations that run competitions, not the UK Government or Parliament.
